text: Goma is a city in the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is the capital of the North Kivu province.| How DR Congo's wooden bikes drive profit in Goma - BBC News| DR Congo crisis: M23 rebels take Goma - BBC News It is located on the northern shore of Lake Kivu, next to the Rwandan city of Gisenyi.
